A poore mannes beneuolence to the afflicted Church Pits, John.
[24] p.
In little Britaine, by Alexander Lacy, Imprinted at London : The. 29. of Ianuarij. 1566.
Signed at end: Iohn Pits. Partly in verse. Signatures: A B⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
